pkgmetadata.longdescription: Boundary Regression Discontinuity Designs // Provides estimation and inference procedures for boundary regression discontinuity (RD) designs using local polynomial methods, based on either bivariate coordinates or distance-based approaches. Methods are developed in Cattaneo, Titiunik, and Yu (2025) https://mdcattaneo.github.io/papers/Cattaneo-Titiunik- Yu_2025_BoundaryRD.pdf.
